name: IMPSLAND
description:
You are the demon guarding a treasure island. Just as you were enjoying the summer, waves of pirates and explorers (and bombs) started invading. Survive for as long as possible in this small action game.

Combat involves you and your enemies trying to send each other to a good swim in the sea. The terrain is destructible and contains some diamonds you can collect to earn upgrades. Watch out for the weather!

The game will likely receive difficulty balance adjustments.
